name: uno-card-game
description:
The UNO card game built in MERN stack.
A online UNO card game version built with Node, React and SocketIO.
The application consist mainly of three pages: * [Home] In this page you can select or create a room to play * [Hall] In this page you wait for more people join to that room to start the game, if needed. (theres a chat too) * [Game] The actual game, in this page you play UNO with everyone in that room.
